_comment: Fixed comet spawn points. Use cooldownSeconds OR scheduledTimes (real-world times like 18:00).

_options.name: Custom name to identify this spawn point (optional)
_options.enabled: true/false - enable or disable this spawn point
_options.cooldownSeconds: Seconds between spawns (used if scheduledTimes is empty)
_options.scheduledTimes: Array of real-world times like ["18:00", "06:00"] - spawns at these times daily
_options.tier: Uncommon, Rare, Epic, or Legendary (optional, random if not set)
_options.theme: Theme name like Skeleton Horde (optional, random if not set)
_options.despawnMinutes: Custom despawn time for this spawn point (optional, uses global if not set)
_options.notifyRadius: Notification: omit = 100 blocks, 'none' = no notification, 'global' = all players, number = custom radius
_options.notifyTitle: Custom notification title (optional, default: 'Tier Comet Falling!')
_options.notifySubtitle: Custom notification subtitle (optional, default: 'Watch the sky!')
